name: Wall Defender
description:
DISCLAIMER: This is my first project please be gentle:)

You are tasked with the duty of protecting a factory in your city from a force of invading creatures. Be sure to build defences and upgrade your gun.

Feel free to download for free and share with friends. If you feel generous enough to support Unfound Games, anything is appreciated :)

I recommend playing on Hard and then going to a lower difficulty if needed. Maybe its a design flaw or maybe its just my favorite difficulty.
